subject: [Mhln] Trade for Windows XP Home Edition OEM
body:
Why kick the man downstream who can't put the parts together because the parts really weren't designed properly?

Lord, how the day passes! It is like a life, so quickly when we don't watch it, and so slowly if we do.

That low vice, curiosity!

Ideas can be life-changing. Sometimes all you need to open the door is just one more good idea.

Calumny is only the noise of madmen.

How things look on the outside of us depends on how things are on the inside of us.

No one worth possessing can be quite possessed.

A cathedral, a wave of storm, a dancer's leap, never turn out to be as high as we had hoped.

We may find in the long run that tinned food is a deadlier weapon than the machine-gun.

I believe love produces a certain flowering of the whole personality which nothing else can achieve.

There can be no daily democracy without daily citizenship.

If a man fools me once, shame on him. If he fools me twice, shame on me.

A rich man without charity is a rogue and perhaps it would be no difficult matter to prove that he is also a fool.
